site.name: BlockNote-py
site.title: BlockNote-py - BlockNote Python Library
site.description: Convert BlockNote.js blocks to HTML, Markdown, PDF & JSON with type-safe Pydantic models. Perfect for Django, FastAPI, Flask backends and headless CMS applications.
site.author: Rohan Sharma Sitoula

home.title: BlockNote-py - BlockNote Python Library
home.description: The Python library for BlockNote.js. Convert blocks to HTML, Markdown, PDF & JSON with type-safe Pydantic models. Perfect for Django, FastAPI, Flask backends.
home.keywords: blocknote python library, blocknotejs python, django blocknote, fastapi blocknote, flask blocknote, python rich text editor

getting-started.title: Getting Started with BlockNote-py - Installation & Quick Start
getting-started.description: Learn how to install and use BlockNote-py in your Python project. Step-by-step guide with examples for Django, FastAPI, and Flask applications.
getting-started.keywords: blocknote-py installation, python blocknote tutorial, django blocknote setup, fastapi blocknote guide

examples.title: BlockNote-py Examples - Real-world Usage Patterns
examples.description: Comprehensive examples showing how to use BlockNote-py with Django, FastAPI, Flask, and other Python frameworks. Convert blocks to HTML, Markdown, and PDF.
examples.keywords: blocknote-py examples, python blocknote code samples, django blocknote examples, fastapi blocknote tutorial

api.title: BlockNote-py API Reference - Complete Documentation
api.description: Complete API reference for BlockNote-py. Detailed documentation of all classes, methods, and functions for converting BlockNote blocks.
